text: Kiya abb tak eman walon kay liye waqt nahi aaya kay unkay dil zikar-e-elaahi say our our jo haqutar chuka hai uss say narum hojayen our unki tarah na hojayen jinhen unn say pehlay kitab di gaee thi phir job inn per aik zamana dorazguzer gaya to unkay dil sakht hogaye our inn mein boht say faasiq hain
